The pictures don't do it justice and the views are really pretty at sunset. The kitchen is well stocked and lots of towels and pool supplies! Thank you Lisa for the wonderful stay! We would definitely book this place again. For local suggestions the Mar Don restaurant is super tasty with a great boat launch.
